00044 // ===========================================================================
00045 // used namespaces

00047 using namespace traci;
00048 
00049 
00050 // ===========================================================================
00051 // method definitions
00052 // ===========================================================================
00053 bool
00054 TraCIServerAPI_Junction::processGet(TraCIServer& server, tcpip::Storage& inputStorage,
00055                                     tcpip::Storage& outputStorage) {
00056     std::string warning = "";   // additional description for response
00057     // variable
00058     int variable = inputStorage.readUnsignedByte();
00059     std::string id = inputStorage.readString();
00060     // check variable
00061     if (variable != ID_LIST && variable != VAR_POSITION && variable != ID_COUNT) {
00062         server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_JUNCTION_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Get Junction Variable: unsupported variable specified", outputStorage);
00063         return false;
00064     }
00065     // begin response building
00066     tcpip::Storage tempMsg;
00067     //  response-code, variableID, objectID
00068     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(RESPONSE_GET_JUNCTION_VARIABLE);
00069     tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(variable);
00070     tempMsg.writeString(id);
00071     if (variable == ID_LIST) {
00072         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00073         MSNet::getInstance()->getJunctionControl().insertIDs(ids);
00074         tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_STRINGLIST);
00075         tempMsg.writeStringList(ids);
00076     } else if (variable == ID_COUNT) {
00077         std::vector<std::string> ids;
00078         MSNet::getInstance()->getJunctionControl().insertIDs(ids);
00079         tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(TYPE_INTEGER);
00080         tempMsg.writeInt((int) ids.size());
00081     } else {
00082         MSJunction* j = MSNet::getInstance()->getJunctionControl().get(id);
00083         if (j == 0) {
00084             server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_JUNCTION_VARIABLE, RTYPE_ERR, "Junction '" + id + "' is not known", outputStorage);
00085             return false;
00086         }
00087         switch (variable) {
00088             case ID_LIST:
00089                 break;
00090             case VAR_POSITION:
00091                 tempMsg.writeUnsignedByte(POSITION_2D);
00092                 tempMsg.writeDouble(j->getPosition().x());
00093                 tempMsg.writeDouble(j->getPosition().y());
00094                 break;
00095             default:
00096                 break;
00097         }
00098     }
00099     server.writeStatusCmd(CMD_GET_JUNCTION_VARIABLE, RTYPE_OK, warning, outputStorage);
00100     server.writeResponseWithLength(outputStorage, tempMsg);
00101     return true;
00102 }
